section.title: Queue 队列
section.programlisting:
#!/usr/bin/env python import Queue import threading import urllib2 import time
hosts = ["http://yahoo.com", "http://google.com", "http://amazon.com", "http://ibm.com", "http://apple.com"]
queue = Queue.Queue()
class ThreadUrl(threading.Thread): """Threaded Url Grab""" def __init__(self, queue): threading.Thread.__init__(self) self.queue = queue
def run(self): while True: #grabs host from queue host = self.queue.get()
#grabs urls of hosts and prints first 1024 bytes of page url = urllib2.urlopen(host) print url.read(1024)
#signals to queue job is done self.queue.task_done()
start = time.time() def main():
#spawn a pool of threads, and pass them queue instance for i in range(5): t = ThreadUrl(queue) t.setDaemon(True) t.start()
#populate queue with data for host in hosts: queue.put(host)
#wait on the queue until everything has been processed queue.join()
main() print "Elapsed Time: %s" % (time.time() - start)
